metadata.subject: Ukrainian Canadians
Ukrainians in motion pictures
metadata.title: RR No. 01 Film and the Ukrainians in Canada, 1921
metadata.creator: Zaporzan, Shirley
Klymasz, Robert Bogdan, 1936-
metadata.note: The 110 items in this filmography cover almost six decades of cinematic production, from 1921 to 1980. This filmography will no doubt be of greatest interest to historians of the cinema, for it provides insights into a significant but poorly documented aspect of film making in Canada
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Canadian Institute of Ukranian Studies, University of Alberta
metadata.description: University of Alberta copy from the library of the St. John's Ukrainian Orthodox Institute
University of Alberta copy in the Richard Spafford Western Canadian Legacy Collection
